entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 7:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12 except 16 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late in the afternoon. High 12 except 16 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 20 March 2023
